name: Sites Vertical Rule
description: This block represnets a vertical rule to be shown on pages.

elements.helpText: This element controls if vertical rules are added between links
elements.label: Include vertical rule between links

elements.helpText: This element controls line color of this vertical rule
elements.label: Line Color

elements.helpText: This element controls opacity of this vertical rule
elements.label: Opacity

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
